epfl.lia.logist.task
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  epfl.lia.logist.task.Task

public class Task
extends java.lang.Object

The task structure representing a unit of work for the agents. Agents evaluate their capacity and decide to take or or that task.

Field Summary

          The name of the agent that picked this task
